content.detailedDescription: When i took most of the pictures they're after work when i get home the one i'm submitting was straight up above me i couldn't see the object with the naked eye but very apparent on camera. i use a long exposure camera app with the camera stationary so that any light movement leaves a trail.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I see them every night the picture i'm submitting is the oddest of them all.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my front porch having a cigarette, looking up as i always do, and i see a light emerge from behind the trees. it seemed to be slowing down, and right before it came to a halt, it was like an explosion almost, it emitted a brighter light and it accelerated then was just gone. i called for my girlfriend and we scanned the skies for a few more minutes but all we saw was the blinking of a distant plane in an almost opposite direction.
content.summary: Light appears, reduces speed, flash of light, fast acceleration, object disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I was awakened at 5:30 a.M. by a wind-like sound...Wasn't sure if it was wind blowing outside, as it was fairly dark, although there was a full moon.  i looked out the window directly by my bed to the east to see if tree branches were blowing to indicate wind...There was a bright star-like light, to the east which dropped straight down to the ground.  it was the size and brightness of venus.  not a meteor, as it fell straight down to earth.  hard to say how far away it was or where/if it landed on the ground.  no idea what this could have been.
content.summary: Starlike object descended straight to earth in a vertical path

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a pic of the moon, when i saw something with a square shape passing by, got one shot of it them it desapeared.
content.summary: Took a shot of the moon, them saw the ufo and got another one. could get only one pic.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside i notice a light in the sky,yellow/orange. it did not move in a straight line. it wobbled for side to side. i did that for about 5-10 minutes. than ascended out if sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered and than wobbled side to side than assended

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging clothes on a washing line when i happened to look up and i saw a strange object in the sky... it was cigar shaped and glowing white. it was moving silently across the sky and appeared to be following the path of a jet trail which was immediately below it... i am guessing that it was in the same area of sky as the jet was but not seeing the jet makes it hard to judge size but i would say this thing was huge. as i said the object was cigar shaped and made up of white light.. rounded at both ends. it had a very slightly fuzzy look around its edges and moved in a straight line... there were clouds in the sky but not many and i clearly seen this object pass between 2 patches of clouds. i did not hear any sound from the object nor did i see any surface features. i have no idea what it was ( but this is not the first time i saw something strange in the sky... when i was very young i saw what i remember as a string of lights in the sky. i remember thinking it was like a necklace and my mom saw it too ) this one was different. it was large and solid and did not blink or pulsate or change colour ... it just moved across the sky. i do not know how long i was looking at it.. i watched it disappear behind a cloud. i did not see it again. as a student of physics and chemistry i tried to get some idea of size and all i can say was it was huge. i did not get the impression that it was low in the sky. i can still see this thing in my mind... but never spoke to anyone but my sister. it has perplexed me greatly. i wish i had a photo of it :(
content.summary: I saw a glowing cigar shaped object in the sky, soundless and appeared to be following a jet trail

content.detailedDescription: We were in front of the house when we viewed these 2 glowing lights at a low altitude..Making absolutely no noise...Hovered over the community for sa couple of minutes. they moved away slowly when one of the lights disappeared while the other one kept going. i took video and picture.
content.summary: Strange lights hovering over menifee 11/25/2015

content.detailedDescription: We were in front of the house when we viewed these 2 glowing lights at a low altitude..Making absolutely no noise...Hovered over the community for sa couple of minutes. they moved away slowly when one of the lights disappeared while the other one kept going. i took video and picture.
content.summary: Strange lights hovering over menifee 11/25/2015

content.detailedDescription:
3 visitors 
2 smalls one and 1 taller

they did something on my body and they were onthe right side on my bed except the tall one who was at the end of the bed .

after  i was in a ship they were taking me in one part of the ship and i saw many many many humans bodies
content.summary: I have receive visitors in my room at 1 in the morning .They took me for a ride

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on back porch just after the sun set behind mountains. noticed 4 round green lights in a line and 4 round red lights in a line. they moved away from each other at both high speeds and low speeds. they would hovers as if facing one another. one zoomed off and then stopped and appeared as just another star. the four orbs became one. one red and one green, they would fly at various speeds and angles, many miles apart from one another.
was able to get short video of one orb moving and changing from solid green to solid red. it never lost its round shape during this change or movement. the other orbs flew away at amazing speed and vanished. just simply amazing display off ability to hover, fly at light speed and turn at any angle.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 4 red and 4 green orbs, changing to one,  fast right angle moves

content.detailedDescription: My sister was taking pics of the blood moon. later in frame by frame review this 'blue planet appeared then moved away. we have a sequence of pics.
content.summary: My sister took this pic, we have more during last blood moon

content.detailedDescription:
I was on google earth looking for deer activity near a friends farm that we hunt at and i was on street view google earth and was traveling down beaver creek rd, boomer nc and i saw something strange just before the curve in the road. i pointed view up above tree line and saw a redish pink object, bell shaped with it's own vapor trails swirling below object.

i took my phone down to my parents to show them what google earth caught. we couldn't believe our eyes. we called the news desk of fox news, charlotte nc and the man was walked through google earth and was not understanding that his view would be from other side of the road curve which is looking into the sun and all he could see is sun in his eyes. he dismissed it and wouldn't reverse view from the opposite angle. it is before the curve before you get to the farm house which should be on the left and above the pine tree line to the right. if you zoom you can see a door or some type of symbol or hatch???
content.summary: Caught on google earth 2015 while searching for hunting spots.

content.detailedDescription: En levant la tãªte. j' ai vu un point lumineux d'aspect mã©tallique proche d'un avion en dã©placement. l'avion avait une traã®nã©e de condensation mais l'autre objet, que je croyais ãªtre un reflet sur un autre avion, n'avait pas de traã®nã©e. j'ai observã© l'objet pendant 2 ou 3 seconde car voyant qu'il brillait et n'avais pas de traã®nã©e, j'ai pensã© que c'ã©tait une ã©toile mais la lumiã¨re ã  fluctuã©e et ã  disparue d'un coup.  l'avion et l'objet ã©taient proche du point de vue que j'avais. et ressemblait ã  un reflet sur un objet mã©tallique. il ã©tait environs 9h du matin.
content.summary: Stationnary light above plane. like ã  star but disappeared suddenly

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Noticed what i thought at first was a new really well lit cell tower. then the landing lights of a newer aircraft, but when 10mins. whent by, i marked the spot where i was standing, and the elavation, by physical referance, also marked its position by landmark referance. it remained what appeared completly motionless for an additional 11 mins. and then moved what had to be at least 1500 feet so fast that you couldnt precieve the motion'straight up. then moved south maybe 250 miles south in the same manner. then vanished.
content.summary: Remained so motionless for 25mins, that i thought it was a new cell tower

content.detailedDescription: Myself & my daughter & baby son had this strange experience back in 2001,we had to go out to the local late night shop because i realised that i had run out of nappies for the baby.Whilst walking back home after just catching the shop which closed at 11pm,we were walking past northbrook college & i looked up pointing out the stars to my daughter as it was a very cold & clear night,we spotted one that seemed massive & brighter than the others & i pointed it out to my daughter;just as i ponted at it the star/light suddenly moved across the sky faster than anything i ever saw move!I said to her wow did you see that?That was no star was it!My daughter said mum look up above our heads & to my amazement there was this massive,gigantic object rectangular in shape & jet black but absolutely covered in multi coloured lights which appeared to be pulsating & changing colour constantly.This thing was gigantic i really cannot emphasise that enough,i mean like three football pitches in length.The underneath reminded me of a gigantic chessboard really as the extremely large number of lights were all in squares but as i said pulsating & changing colour all the time.I could see some kind of shapes sticking out above the rectangle base a bit like turrets or arms sticking out.I was transfixed looking at the object in fascination to start with but then quickly became very afraid & felt an overwhelming need to get my children away from this object & get back home.I remember telling my daughter to hold on to the handle of her brothers pram & run faster with me than she had ever run before.I was too afraid to look back & i do not remember the journey home at all,which is odd when i think about it now the next thing i can remember is being outside my front door & shaking with fear so much that i could not get my door key into the lock.When i got back indoors i realised with a shock that it was about 12.20am & that journey from the shop to my house should only have taken 20 - 25 minutes maximum;i had left the shop at about 11.05pm.But then i am not sure how long i stood gazing at the craft above our heads for but not long probably because we were very afraid!I should have reported this ages ago probably but my life went into a few problems soon after this sighting happened,it was only when i told my dad about it that rather than laughing as i had thought he might he got quite serious &said this must be reported as i think it sounds like a real ufo sighting.
content.summary: While walking back from shop late night with my children we noticed a star that was too large & very bright,i pointed at it & it moved faster than anything i ever saw move.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on pallmeto ave when i noticed an awsome blue light wiggling up from over the colton cement factory wich is three or four miles from where i was ,this blue light after not going to high in the sky after hovering for just a few seconds grew to at least 1000 times it's size and shot off at a horizontal angle as fast as the blink of an eye i will never forget it ,it was an awesome  unbelievable site i hope you believe  me they are out there it was real oh and i found a hole in the ground that has no bottom if you wanna  see it or hear about it you can call me (760) 792--0087 my name is jason votruba
content.summary: Awsome blue small light that wiggled up from hill that grew from the size of a golfball to the size of the moon blink ofan eye and shot out just as fast

content.detailedDescription: A light that was like a star was in the sky then got brighter and brighter, a craft was coming it was not a star, it had two head lights wings with no lights red light between wings and no tail i could see it hovering over me about tree top level 90 degrees above me i heard a buzz or hum like noise after about 10 to 15 seconds it left going in strait line of original direction seen lots of things but never a plane with no tail and two headlights no wing lights if there is a aircraft like i never heard of but i saw one
content.summary: Two head light's wings with no light and no tail to see small red light between wings

content.detailedDescription: Late one night i was staying over at a tire shop for security reasons. its very well secured so no one comes or goes without me knowing about it. so i was there alone with the company of my cats. then around 11pm something started banging really hard on the bay door. causing my cats to freak out. i waited to see if maybe it would stop, but it didnt. i finally go brave enough and took my cell phone with me. its dark out there with only a couple lights. when i went out the door to investigate there were some strange lizard/snake like beings running away into the dark. i chased them probably a little more than 20 yards and also trying to photograph themwith my cell phone. ive also heard them comunicating to each other in a very strange language and in very non- human sounding verbalization. i have learrned many things from these and other "strange " beings. mostl and from just from watching them and trying to understand their symbolic and other means of communication. i know what the great pyramid and perhaps many others were used for and were they have originated from. they were originally referred to as " the vessels of the gods" also the oldest know ufo's in the history of the earth. they've been used on our world in ways they weren't meant to be. mostly they were used as "reanimation chambers, so in other words they were to clone or something similar to that and even genetic hybridzation amongst many species. there's even an hierglyph on the pyramid showing one of the incubator/birthing pods. i've also learned what the mayan crystal skulls were used for and even how to use them. there is just so much that i need to share with someone that will atleast listen to me with an open mind and i have tons of photos and other means of proof. otherwise all these i just keep to myself as i believe most people will think i'm crazy whether i have proof or not. thanks for your time and wish you the best for the holidays.
content.summary: Late one night for about 30 minutes something was banging on the door this was on secured property so no one came or went without me knowing and supposedly i was the only one there.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 430 am just dropped bf off at work an he forgot his phone as i was getting into vehicle i noticed a light in sky just hovering an making odd movement an the video shows you the rest , i felt like the world was going to end . i was frightened but very amazed never seen anything like it before
content.summary: I thought the world was ending

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on the 1-5 heading north to castlerock when i noticed a bright object thought was a plane at first but wasn't moving just hovering in place it was cigar shaped object with wing's pointed the opposite direction wings would normally be pointed when under the objected noticed it wasn't very wide like a normal plane the lights on the front of the object were a intense white light and the backside of the object's lights were yellow/orange almost blinding when looking at object
content.summary: Hovered over a building and emitted a very whitish yellowish light (bright)

content.detailedDescription: I was riding home from richmond travelling towards cumberland when i noticed the object. my car had reached a clearing, and i wasn't driving (my mother was) so i was watching out the window. as we drove by the clearing, i noticed what i thought to be a meteor falling from the sky. it fell for a few seconds, but at a rate much steeper than most meteors i had observed before (it was close to perpendicular with the ground). i also noticed a greenish hue. while small, it was much slower and larger than any shooting star i had seen. after falling for a few seconds, the object performed a move that appeared to be a combination of a loop and a roll. it then seemed to disappear entirely. as it "disappeared" i completely lost sight of it due to more trees. by then, there was no way to see if it was still in the area or not. i immediately thought of the two options besides a ufo that the object might have been. first, a meteor, which is entirely possible, but like no meteor i've seen. second, some sort of bug, but since it was sub-freezing that night, i found that hard to believe. my personal opinion in the matter is that it was a meteor burning out in the atmosphere, with something causing the greenish hue, and my own poor eyesight (i'm a touch near-sighted and was tired that night) accounting for the erratic behavior of said-same object.
content.summary: A bright light that descended then maneuvered quickly and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was taking my daughter to school this morning and they both saw  something in the air. my daughter thought it was an alien and my wife thought it was a cloud opening with a bizarre shape...Only there's no clouds around.  my wife doesn't believe in extra-terrestrial life, thinks there's a logical explanation for what they saw and doesn't want me to contact you. my daughter is very much like her mom; but, she can't explain what's ion the photo. she said when they turned south onto another road the object became smaller then disappeared.  

i asked my daughter if there was anything on the windshield and she said "no". i considered reaching out to the local newspaper with at least one photo but changed my mind when i remembered about mufon (love your shows). not sure what to make of this photo...Any ideas? i have more.
content.summary: My wife was driving my daughter to school and they both saw this object in the air. they took some photos then the object vanished..

content.detailedDescription: Starlike orb that randomly flashed blue green and red lights. thought possible helicopter but at a distance of 15 miles it was just to large to be a helo. remains in same position for 2hrs then disappears. during the sighting i observed an fixed wing aircraft pass behind the object at approx 3-5 miles. then the object disappeared. the object was hovering over trinity or houston co. north east of my position possibly san jacinto or polk co. being retired military, i'm very familiar with the shapes, lights and flight characteristics of helicopters. at the distance observed it was just way to large to be any type of helo. approx. altitude was 15-20,000 ft.
content.summary: Circular orb that remained motionless. could see fixed winged aircraft pass behind orb after approx. 30 minutes many miles behind orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the bus at around 6:28 a.M. i was on my way to school. i was looking out the window and looked up at the sky. i was viewing the sunrise. then i saw it. it was black, almost a very dark grey. it was a perfect isosceles triangle. it had two lights on each side of the bottom corners. they were flashing like a plane and had one blue light on one side and one red light on the other.It also had one big white light in the middle of it. it was round, like a circle. when i saw it, it was moving in a straight path and then when i froze it just stopped and started to rotate very slowly. i started to feel very warm, like i had a fever. i tried to get my phone out so i could record it but it started to glitch. then when i looked back at it, that's exactly when the bus started to move again because we were waiting at a stop light. i couldn't believe what i had seen. now i can't get my mind off of it. every time i look into the sky, i see some kind of thing. but these things might just be planes or helicopters, but they always remind me of what i saw that day.
content.summary: Black isosceles triangle with white lights on both bottom corners. a blue light on one side and red on the other next to the white lights but on different sides.

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a smoke on my 5th story roofdeck

i am on the phone with my sibling i suddenly realize there are around 10 weird lights in the sky in front of and above me

bright, start as dots, stretch out to lines, some of them arc and then straighten

the sun was setting from the west so every other object in the sky was a black silhouette, but these objects were shining brightly as though front lit

several non commercial plans appear in the area, and helicopters begin closing in on the 3 that are remaining near the phila airport

i captured some video of this on my phone
content.summary: Starts with 10 lights in sky, from dots to lines, travel in different directions, 3 remain longer

content.detailedDescription: I usually sleep late at night and i came out at night to have a smoke i saw a shooting star recently and wishing to see another one i looked up to see a star glowing very bright as i kept looking i saw that it was moving i have never seen a star moving caught with curiosity i kept on looking and suddenly i noticed another star brighter than the previous one but triple the size i was confused but then i noticed they two were looking the same but in different sizes i brushed my eyes to see if i am seeing the conical light due to some dust in my eyes but not they were totally clear just to confirm i washed my face and came back again to see them i was more amazed to see the second star has risen near to the second one and even it was hovering in the same way like the first now i was sure they were not stars as stars never change positions so quickly i kept on staring at them for another half an hour and i saw two plane s fly by as i saw the second plane i struck to another star which was very faint but was. moving in a constant straight line it was just moving steady without any flickr of light i watced it move across the sky and then suddenly 10-15 smaller light came out of it and started flying around it in a circle and they kept on flying i watched in astonishment and watched till they disappeared from sight due to distance i was now sure these star like objects are not aircrafts and i clicked 3 photos with my mobile of the brightest one among those. after 2 hours of seeing them i called one of my friend to have. a look and he was also amazed to see the bright light. he also claimed he has never seen anything such bright in the sky. to make sure i traced them for  2 nights  but i never saw them again.Earlier that day i read the news that many other residents have seen ufo and a re posting them  so i decided to share my experience too.
content.summary: Brightest star-like object i have ever seen in my life

content.detailedDescription: I usually sleep late at night and i came out at night to have a smoke i saw a shooting star recently and wishing to see another one i looked up to see a star glowing very bright as i kept looking i saw that it was moving i have never seen a star moving caught with curiosity i kept on looking and suddenly i noticed another star brighter than the previous one but triple the size i was confused but then i noticed they two were looking the same but in different sizes i brushed my eyes to see if i am seeing the conical light due to some dust in my eyes but not they were totally clear just to confirm i washed my face and came back again to see them i was more amazed to see the second star has risen near to the second one and even it was hovering in the same way like the first now i was sure they were not stars as stars never change positions so quickly i kept on staring at them for another half an hour and i saw two plane s fly by as i saw the second plane i struck to another star which was very faint but was. moving in a constant straight line it was just moving steady without any flickr of light i watced it move across the sky and then suddenly 10-15 smaller light came out of it and started flying around it in a circle and they kept on flying i watched in astonishment and watched till they disappeared from sight due to distance i was now sure these star like objects are not aircrafts and i clicked 3 photos with my mobile of the brightest one among those. after 2 hours of seeing them i called one of my friend to have. a look and he was also amazed to see the bright light. he also claimed he has never seen anything such bright in the sky. to make sure i traced them for  2 nights  but i never saw them again.Earlier that day i read the news that many other residents have seen ufo and a re posting them  so i decided to share my experience too.
content.summary: Brightest star-like object i have ever seen in my life

content.detailedDescription:
It was the 4th of july.  a friend and i had attended the festivities earlier in the evening.  we were sitting in a small cove at around 10-11 pm watching the plankten sparkling in the ocean.  on the horizon opposite us, just above a large peninsula that reaches out into the ocean, we saw a glowing green orb which appeared to our left (north) and slowly traveled to the right (south) along the tree line.  at first we thought it might have something to do with the 4th of july fireworks, but it was soon clear that it wasn't.  it took quite a while to travel the length of the peninsula, and then it disappeared behind the right hand edge of our little cove.  so it's journey formed the right half of a large u.  we both heard or sensed something - can't remember exactly - and looked behind us, and there was the orb, pulsating just above the tops of the dense trees, maybe 20 ft away - more or less - it was hard to tell.  we simultaneously heard a sight splashing sound and saw a large, white raccoon emerging from the water, headed right for us.  in the moonlight, with the water dripping off of it and the plankten sparkling, it was a beautiful sight.  also scary - to me, anyway. my friend reached out her hand and said, "hello little raccoon", and at the same time i grabbed her wrist, yanked her up and we made a dash for the cabin we were staying in, which was close by.  something about that raccoon's purposeful march toward us didn't feel right.  we stayed on the cabin's porch for a while before going back outside.  the green orb and the raccoon were both gone.  we never made an effort to look for the area over which it had hovered.  keep in mind this was in maine, in a sparsely populated coastal area, and most of it was covered in dense woods.

i have never forgotten this experience.  i have since lost touch with my friend, who - as far as i know - was the only other person to see it.  i am convinced that this was paranormal.  the whole thing - even the air - felt charged with some kind of unfamiliar energy.

the map i am attaching (or trying to!) shows the area.  we were just a bit north of where the "d" is in "rd", opposite the little peninsula that juts out just to the east.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed glowing green orb moving along horizon, disappearing behind point of land and reappearing behind

content.detailedDescription:
These pictures were taken on 11/21/2015 on an android ice cell phone, while driving on the 15 & 215 freeways in ontario ca. 
thought to be routine pictures of the mountains on a clear day, the ufos in these photos were discovered by chance three days later on 11/24/2015.
content.summary: Strange objects moving through the sky under intelligent control.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed two yellow-orange orbs on 11/24/2015 at approx., 8:40 while standing in my patio.
i can see the flightpath going to sky harbor clearly. these were not in any way related to aircraft.
one was larger than the other and was traveling in horizontally in straight path. the other smaller
headed up in a straight path of ascension and disappeared. i walked into the house to fetch my
binoculars, upon returning they were both gone. 

also observed a small, but bright meteor within 5 to 10 minutes while waiting for possible return.
content.summary: Two orange spheres in nw direction from backyard
